title: at this point i believe players need to have an average KDA/objective participation to play ranked
body: because im tired of getting people like ones i had in my last ranked game making literally impossible to even attempt to win because they have already fed the enemy 3 kills before the 5 minute mark we shouldn't allow just anyone to play ranked there needs to be a standard other than have X amount of champions and be X level, i really hope riot fixes the troll issue and players who are incomprehensibly horrible at the game and ruin every single game they touch.
